translations: n.拉链；（新闻或广告的）建筑物外墙滚动亮屏显示

sentences.sentence: The sundress has a neat back zipper fastening.
sentences.translation: 这件太阳裙背后有根灵巧的拉链。

sentences.sentence: Zipper was cleverly incorporated into the side of the teacup.
sentences.translation: 拉链巧妙地嵌在茶杯的一侧。

sentences.sentence: He made a zipper that worked very well. This is the same zipper we use today.
sentences.translation: 他做了一个很好用的拉链，这就是我们今天使用的拉链。
